NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
63 
Chapter 8: FETAL MONITORING
Purpose 
• Fet
al monitoring aims to assess fetal wellbeing during viable pregnancies – antenatally and during labour.
